Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Phylloseptin-S2 (PLS-S2; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; UCLL1; XXA)
Sequence Information.Source: the waxy monkey tree frog, the painted-belly leaf frog,Phyllomedusa sauvagii, South America

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (94.7%) toPhylloseptin-S1. Only residue 15 (L) differs from Phylloseptin-S1, where it is I.Activity: Active against Gram+ S. aureus (MIC 6.25 uM), E. faecalis ATCC 29212 (MIC 25 uM), S. pyogenes ATCC 19615 (MIC 1.56 uM), Gram- E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 25-30 uM), A. baumannii ATCC 19606 (MIC 6.25 uM), K. pneumoniae ATCC 13883 (MIC 25 uM), yeast C. parapsilosis ATCC 22019 (MIC 50 uM), S. cerevisiae (MIC 6.25 uM), and parasite L. infantum, L. major, and L. braziliensis (IC50 13.3-18.5 uM).
Literature Information.Author: Raja Z, Andr√© S, Piesse C, Sereno D, Nicolas P, Foulon T, Oury B, Ladram Al. 2013
Literature Information.Title: Structure, antimicrobial activities and mode of interaction with membranes of novel [corrected] phylloseptins from the painted-belly leaf frog, Phyllomedusa sauvagii
